about.hobby: In my free time I devote myself to traveling. Hitchhiking, I traveled half of Europe and I'm not going to stop there. I try to be up-to-date with technical innovations.
about.sports: Privately I am an instructor of Windsurfing and Snowboarding. He is addicted to sports and adrenaline on a daily basis. Active trips and travels are something that gives me strength to act.
about.programing: Programming I deal with from the High School. I have completed many projects in various languages so far. Currently, I devote the most time to develop Front End skills
about.me: I am open and creative. I learn quickly and can find myself in every situation. I perfectly manage entrusted tasks and my working time.
